titleStmt.title: To the right worshipful Iohn Fowke, alderman of the ward of Farrington within, to the deputy, Common-counsell, and to the rest of the inhabitants of the aforesaid ward. The humble petition of Joseph Hunscot citizen and stationer of London.
titleStmt.author: Hunscot, Joseph.

notesStmt.note: Petitioning for the position of beadle in the ward of Farrington.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
